description:
HDTV Adapter Kit for NOOK HD and NOOK HD+
This handy kit enables you to stream content from your NOOK HD or NOOK HD+ to a high-definition TV, via the included adapter and High Speed HDMI Cable. The kit also includes a pass-through that allows you to charge your NOOK while streaming, so there's no danger of running out of battery power before you're done. (A compatible NOOK Power Kit is required for this function and is not included with the adapter kit.)
title: Barnes & Noble HDTV Adapter Kit for NOOK HD and NOOK HD+

description: Power up your device with this Barnes & Noble OV/HB-ADP Universal Power Kit._x000D_ _x000D_ This Universal Power Kit is specifically designed for your Nook HD and Nook HD+. The kit comes in handy in case you need to replace an old AV adapter or just happen to need a back up. Its retractable prongs make it more convenient for your digital lifestyle. Buy this Barnes & Noble OV/HB-ADP Universal Power Kit now!
title: Barnes & Noble OV/HB-ADP Universal Power Kit
